nodes.text: The five syndicates was a term given to several crime syndicates located in the galaxy. Crimson Dawn, Black Sun, the Crymorah syndicate, the Hutt Clan, and the Pyke Syndicate all made up the group. Although it consisted of five major crime syndicates, the smaller Son-tuul Pride was a sixth member. During the time of the Galactic Empire, Crimson Dawn was widely considered as the most powerful and dangerous among the syndicates, and enjoyed a fragile alliance with the Pykes. Darth Maul, Head of Crimson Dawn works behind the shadows of the under world as the fallen apprentice of Darth Sidious. Though Crimson Dawn was loathe to risk it, warring among the factions was not uncommon.
